subject: Football

Football (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Running back Lyle McCombs and quarterback Scott McCummings each ran for two touchdowns and the Huskies defeated the Scarlet Knights, 40-22.
snippet: Running back Lyle McCombs and quarterback Scott McCummings each ran for two touchdowns and the Huskies defeated the Scarlet Knights, 40-22.
